text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Trump is an idiot, a DANGEROUS idiot.

Not Jason Bourne dangerous, more like drank a 5th of whiskey and now thinks he can race in Nascar with innocent bystanders wandering the track...

He'd do it too, he's be all "I'D HAVE THE BEST RATINGS OF ANYONE EVER!
https://t.co/MQMzU0AGXd
